DOC.brief_summary: This study compares the effect of infusion of two types of modern hydroxyethyl starch on the renal function and acid-base in patients undergoing urologic surgery.
DOC.brief_title: Use of Two Modern Hydroxyethyl Starch Solutions in Major Urological Procedures
DOC.criteria: Age group above 18 years, ASA І and ІІ, Patients who will be scheduled to undergo radical prostatectomy or cystectomy with bladder replacement A known allergy to HES, Renal insufﬁciency (serum creatinine of >2.5 mg/dL), Signiﬁcant hepatic disease (liver function tests more than three times the upper limit of normal), Coagulation disorders (INR > 1.5).
